suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider adding more distinct shading or highlights to the children's hair to create a stronger contrast with their faces. This can help to make their features stand out more prominently. Additionally, using a slightly darker or lighter background color can enhance the overall contrast and make the vibrant colors of the rainbow and the children's clothing pop even more.
